reviewText: Very little content. There is more intro music than useful info. The take aways would fit easily on 1/2 page. There are hundreds of websites that offer better, more condensed marketing info...and they are all free.
Just a theoritical course that give nothing practical about marketing. Reading marketing principles book is much better
The lecturers have poor vocabulary and pronunciation and the videos are very repetitive. They r repeating the same thing in all the videos.

Was supposed to be advanced course in Coursera, but to be honnest was more for beginners.From the course itself : despite the SWOT analysis, no real tools given to you to allowi fine tuning your digital / off line marketing plan. Submission was also a real nightmare as the system identify copy paste and did not allow you to copy your homeworks. A real lake of time.I do not recommend

This is the first subscription I cancelled.  It was very difficult to get into the content.  I also tend to have an issue with peer reviewed assignments and this course had multiple peer reviewed assignments.  You are at someones mercy if you can even get someone to review it.
Assignments should be review by teachers, in my opinion. Also, last assignment was inconsistent with what said in the course.
Not really good translation in the subtitles
the accent of the teacher is not clear!!!
Just completes the definition purpose .. need to bring more meat to elaborate on definitions and real life examples with diversified . The notes were good but not that insightful for me
The content and the instructor and the course is very clear and mind mapped very well.
The professor explained each phrase of the marketing plan clearly. It would be great if students can have professional review on their assignment besides peer-graded review.
i have learnt alot about marketing plan and other important things concerning marketing
Great....
great formative course, but it needs more in the practical part.

Great Class. You really need to hold yourself up to the standards you want and there isn't much guidance in the way for format. Peer graded assignments provide easy grading but no real feedback on the work you've submitted.
the only missing piece is peer-review by Professors. other than that - all is great! :)
The course was in my opinion the best one out of the 4 course but the english subtitles were often wrong.
great
The course content is very good but the forums could be more active.
Good presentation and performance,,,Thanks
Great learning experience. Very interesting course with real life examples and cases.
OK
I'm so glad to have studied this course. Thank you!
Very helpful
Great course and profesional instructor.

Very good course. Manages to cover the berth of the marketing plan, in a simple, easy to follow and engaging manner. Although it does not cover the topics in depth, and week 4 covers metrics and analytics in a rather superficial way, it manages to summarize the key aspects of developing a marketing plan and put everything in an easy-to-digest nutshell. I can take it from here and not only to develop a marketing plan for my own company, but also I feel better prepared to understand more specialized literature on the topic.
The content is really valuable and useful!
Great
well needed course
Nice course
Honestly, mind-blowing,  I am really happy and thankful.
The way this course is designed and professors articulate subject, it is just awesome.

EXCELENTE CURSO PARA MI APRENDIZAJE COMO PROFESIONAL EN INGENIERÍA INDUSTRIAL. MUCHAS GRACIAS. PERO TENGO PROBLEMAS PORQUE NO ME PERMITE INSCRIBIRME EN EL PROYECTO FINAL DE CAPSTONE PARA PODER OBTENER MI CERTIFICADO COMO ESPECIALISTA EN ESTRATEGIA DE MARKETING.
It's one of the best courses I've ever seen
I could learn fundamental knowledge to plan the marketing strategy, thank you.
This course simplified everything that was learnt in the previous courses and gave a suitable straightforward approach to developing a marketing plan. The instructor was superb!
Really good one, but if you are new to marketing start from the first course in the specialization.

Muy bueno el curso...  Mi Proyecto es sobre Servicio y me costo un poco el ultimo modulo sobre el presupuesto...  Me hizo pensar mucho...   Gracias como siempre.. al Profesor,,,,,  y su metodología de estudio...

The course in itself, the professor and interviews excellent, but I would have liked for the students to be able to turn in assignments in a PDF or Power Point format. The instructions ask for graphics and charts, but the system did not allow for us to upload attachments not put any of these on the page. So the result is that the person (peer) grading was not grading fairly unable to verify responses.  The last 2 assignments required financial information that was very difficult to display in the format given.  Grading matrix did not coincide with assignment instructions. I strongly suggest that this be reviewed by someone from IE or staff.
REALLY USEFUL! I REALLY ENJOY IT!
Very informative course
It enabled me to improve my brand plan in real life

Excellent course. The content was explained in a methodical way. The professor was highly knowledgeable and guest interviews gave additional insights and made sure the course was not monotonous. The exercise made you implement the learning effectively.
Information in course was very quality and usefull/
good course. but it will be easier if we can upload files for the assignment, instead of typing in the colums provided.
I learned a lot of things about the marketing plan. Everything is well explained.
Excellent  Professor.
Great course to learn. Simple and easy to understand and apply
good
Wonderful content and lots of learning involved. Thank You for providing wonderful course
EXCELLENT!
That was very good session!
Great course. Very well explained and good material for reading!!!
very good
really amazing course and instractor
Excelente curso impartido por IE Business School. El profesor, inigualable, conocedor del contenido impartido y un excelente profesional. Gracias mil por permitirme dicha capacitacion.

All the basics are covered with excellent explanation, Peer Graded assignments will help us to stimulate our mind. By the end, you will be understanding how to design a Marketing Plan and what aspects we should put for a good marketing plan
it was really nice experience
Really I just wanted to let you know that the course is very very high quality and the instructor is more than perfect
Very interesting course
Great Course!
Muy bueno!
The information is so simple but very importaint.
Very useful topic and help me up to reach next level.
The best course from the Marketing Strategy Specialization.
The course is very interesting and informative. Thank you so much for instructing Ana Pelayo.

This is the best part out of 4 in the "Marketing Strategy" specialisation. It is a recap of all the previous topics that have been presented before and it's done in a very balanced thorough manner which allowed me to properly digest all the information and also to understand how to perform the assignments. Very good course!

I really enjoyed that,course and there has been a lot to learn from this course. I truly than the instructor who has made this course so beautifully. This is the best course that I have done in the Marketing Specialisation. Thank you IE Business Schooland Thank you Coursera
Great and simple! Very useful for Junior brand manager. Thanks
Great Course. It also summarizes the three courses that was taught previously. I'm in love with marketing and Coursera.
Very well done course.
The content and the instructor and the course is very clear and mind mapped very well, I was able to do my Company Marketing Plan for 2017 using this knowledge
Easy to navigate. Refined and professional instructor. Make it easy to relate and learn by quoting relevant examples throughout. All in all it was a great learning experience.
Really involved and detailed. Actual strategies discussed and not just theories. Quite a few videos and external resources. I learned so much from this course.
Truly great course.
Great. Helped me a lot
忙着准备考研，完成的不是很好，不过我会继续努力完成的
Amazing course..simple,lucid language for our understanding. It helped me a lot. Thank you so much for introducing this entire marketing strategy series of courses.
